entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
